so_951347: wormhole:tmp admp$ echo -n "fooa" > one # -n to supress newline
wormhole:tmp admp$ echo -n "foobc" > two
wormhole:tmp admp$ SIZE=`stat -c %s one`
wormhole:tmp admp$ echo $SIZE
4
wormhole:tmp admp$ (cmp -s -n $SIZE one two && echo "equal") || echo "not equal"
not equal
wormhole:tmp admp$ echo -n "fooac" > two # first 4 bytes are equal now
wormhole:tmp admp$ (cmp -s -n $SIZE one two && echo "equal") || echo "not equal"
equal

so_57436884: #!/bin/bash
for d in /users/*/;
do
    if [ "$d" != "/users/exclusionprofile1/" ] && [ "$d" != "/users/exclusionprofile2/" ]; then
           echo "$d"
           sudo rm -rf "$d"
    fi
done

Explanations about Options.-n: do not output the trailing newline
